com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.utils

Class MotorGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.utils.MotorGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Motor

    public class MotorGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements Motor
    A class that lets us group together motors and mass-set their speeds. Specific motors can also be inverted.

    • Constructor Summary

        Description copied from interface: Motor
        Set a motor's power
        Specified by:
        setPower in interface Motor
        Parameters:
        d - Value between 1 and -1 where -1 is full reverse, 1 is full forward, and 0 is stopped.
